titleInfo.title: Wedding of David and Essie Martin Green, [graphic]

mods:mods.note: Wedding of David and Essie Green on November 8, 1929. The bride is one of seventeen children born to Mr. and Mrs. Daniel Martin.(Parents are standing behind the bride and groom.) The groom, David Green is one of thirteen children born to Mr. and Mrs. David Green. Others pictured are family members and friends.
New Hope Baptist Church was located at Cliff and Muscott.( now Medical Center Drive.) Pictured is the Missionary members at a garden party.

titleInfo.title: Towne Allison Pharmacy on 3rd and D in San Bernardino, [graphic]

mods:mods.abstract: Frank M. Towne at his pharmacy.In 1895 Towne established a drugstore at 406 Third St. By 1909 a second store opened at 576 Third Street.Frank Towne died in 1919. The Towne-Allison Drug Co. continued until 1946 when it went out of business.
